lines.text: Names = character array of size 15 width 6
lines.code: char Names [ 6 ] [ 15 ] = { " Power " , " Time " , " Space " , " Soul " , " Reality " , " Mind " } ;

lines.text: in function DeleteIt with argument integer x that returns nothing
replace the value of element Names [ x ] with a space character
Colours = character array of size 10 and width n
for i = 0 to n exclusive , then read Colours [ i ]
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) cin >> Colours [ i ] ;

lines.text: if Colours [ i ] is not purple
if Colours [ i ] is not green
if Colours [ i ] is not blue
if Colours [ i ] is not orange
if Colours [ i ] is not red
if Colours [ i ] is not yellow
if Names [ i ] is not a space character , then continue
